creation(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->[deity0_name] created nature, and created multitudes of insects, giving them some of the most important roles to fulfill.
episode(uses=1,tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->The people began killing insects en masse, and seeing their helpnessness, [deity0_name] armed them with larger, stronger bodies, and deadly limbs.

intro(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->The first to arrive at the [place_summery] [place_name] tried to exterminate an insectoid nest. They were wiped out instead, due to the newfound strength bestowed on the insects by [deity0_name].
conflict(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->A violent [foeLeader] set fire to an insectoid hive, causing great suffering to its inhabitants and the surrounding environment.

founderJoin(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Since childood, [founderName] was fascinated by the coordination and selflessness of insects. [founder_pronoun] dreamed of becoming a [founder_objective] in order to reform human society such that it resembled that of insectoids.

victory(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->[founderName] marched with an army of [memberNamePlural] and insectoids towards [place_powerCenter]. A long battle ensued, resulting in the defeat of [foeLeader] and [foeLeader_possessive] [foeSoldiers].
setup(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Seeing the suffering brought about by waging war against insectoids, [founderName] advocated for taming and raising them instead.
story(uses=1,tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->We realized that there was much to learn from insectoids, and that were more docile than expected.
lessonIntro(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Look at any insectoid colony, and it becomes clear as day that
lesson(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->insects are the perfect organisms, deserving immense respect rather than comtempt.
lesson(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->it is better to co-exist and have a symbiotic relationship with insects.
lessonReinforcement(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Those who raise and live with insectoids in harmony seem to lead fulfilling and joyful lives.
archistBasis(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Archotechs are a part of the universal consciousness, just as insectoids are a part of their hive's collective mind.
archistFact(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Archotechs and insectoids are both highly adaptible, resilient, and intelligent beings. These shared characteristics are no mere coincidence.

archistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->[inTheEnd], humanity will incorporate into itself the advantageous characteristics of the insectoids, and gain mass conscioussness. Their combined power will enable them to rise to the level of the archotechs.
animistFact(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->Insectoids can connect to the spirit world just as humans can.

animistProphecy(tag=meme_InsectoidPrimacy)->[itIsSaid] that one day the true owner of the [relic0_name] will bring out its spirit, who will bestow humans with the strength and capabilities of insectoids.
